2015 agossthu masa 28 dina yala jathika udayanayedi wahanayak gati diwiyeku miyayamath samaga yala jathika udyanayata paminena safari jip ratha menma anekuth wahana sadaha dadi nithi rithi panawana ladi .shrilankawa thula mulin athikala wanajiwi rakshitha kalapayan lesa 1900 di pamana yala ha wilpaththuwa wenkarana ladi .ee atharin ada wanawita yala jathika udyanayata paminena sancharakayin bohomayak ee wetha paminenne diwiyan daka bala ganimata wuwath lankawa thula dakiya haki bohomayak wana sathun ee thula daknata labima yala thulata sancharaka aakarshanayata hethuwa wi thibe .yuddhayen pasu yalathiswasaraka pawathi yuddhaya nima wi rata samaya labimath samaga yalata paminena sancharakayin wadiwimath samaga safari jip ratha da wadi wi atha.
